overview: ALL 10 MUSIC VIDEOS FROM BUTTERFLY 3000 STITCHED SEAMLESSLY TOGETHER AND COMPILED ON HIGH-DEFINITION BLU-RAY. IT ALSO INCLUDES THE ORIGINAL CUTS AS WELL AS FUN BEHIND THE SCENES EXTRAS AND A 24 PAGE GLOSSY-PHOTO FSC-APPROVED BOOKLET. HOUSED IN AN ECO-FRIENDLY RECYCLED CARDBOARD CASE DESIGNED BY JASON GALEA. IT LOOKS AND FEELS DOPE. HOOK IT UP TO YOUR TELLY, TURN UP THE VOLUME AND METAMORPHOSIZE.
title: Butterfly 3000: Ocular Edition
